article: Strip Twister Guidelines: How to Play a Classic Game in a Fun & Sexy Way
intro: It’s time for a twist on an old classic! Twister is a great party game, but every now and then, it's nice to spice things up a bit. You can do just that with Strip Twister! Keep reading to learn how to play Strip Twister and kick your evening up a notch.
